temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: If the SID_AXIS is non-zero, then this modes associated parameters will become visible on the next parameter refresh and entry into the mode will be allowed.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( SID_AXISnon == zero -> rise ( modesasociaeters == parvisise ) and armeterer == refreshe )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: Otherwise, an error message will be logged and sent to the ground control station indicating that mode entry has been prohibited.
